WorkItem.Description:
Whenever I try to optimize my character, it complains that there are too many leg items even though I only have 3 items selected as available to the optimizer.
Â 
Attached is my character sheet.
WorkItem.Summary: Optimizer complains of too many leg items

Comments.Message:
It's not complaining for nothing... You have too many different leg options. All the different gems you have play into the number of potential leg options you have as well, remember.

This isn't a hard limit or anything, it's just a warning that more options it has to consider translates to worse accuracy/speed, and you're getting towards 'too many'.
